name: Snipers vs Gangstar 3D
description:
You are Police Sniper Shooter! Your duty is killing & shooting prisoners who try to escape from the jail. you will discover difficult task to shoot prisnoner who try to escape from jails. It's not easy to shoot prisoner before they escape but you have to plan where & when for shooting them and stop planning prison break.

Don’t let the prisoners escape jails. Every minute is important. Plan your shoot before execute your plan to stop prison break out from the prison cells.

The prisoner are very smart. They plan the way to escape jail before you know. So you are smart shooting guard too. Kill them all before they run away from prison cell.

You can use new weapon for shooting. when you have more experience (EXP). Every time you complete the mission, you will get more killing experience

SNIPER GAME FEATURES
• Additive & Unique Shooting Gameplay!
• Play as Police Sniper Shooter
• Aim, Shoot, Zoom in, Zoom Out and reload gun.
• Upgrade new gun with new ability to shoot better.
• Kill Prisoners who trying to ecacpe the prison cells.
• High quality exciting sound & effects.
• New level will update every weeks.

Download for Free Today! Let's play!
